mapper.sql: points_rule_id as pointsRuleId, points_rule as pointsRule, points_rule_type as pointsRuleType, grade as grade, money_scope_min as moneyScopeMin, money_scope_max as moneyScopeMax, bonus_column as bonusColumn, points_datum_rate as pointsDatumRate, coefficient as coefficient, day_income as dayIncome, achieve_customer_cost as achieveCustomerCost, status as status, remark as remark, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, create_time as createTime, last_modifier_id as lastModifierId, last_modifier_name as lastModifierName, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert: insert into drt_opr_points_rule (points_rule_id, points_rule, points_rule_type, grade, money_scope_min, money_scope_max, bonus_column, points_datum_rate, coefficient, day_income, achieve_customer_cost, status, remark, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, last_modifier_id, last_modifier_name, last_modify_time, is_delete) values (#{pointsRuleId}, #{pointsRule}, #{pointsRuleType}, #{grade}, #{moneyScopeMin}, #{moneyScopeMax}, #{bonusColumn}, #{pointsDatumRate}, #{coefficient}, #{dayIncome}, #{achieveCustomerCost}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifierId}, #{lastModifierName}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{isDelete})
